cleanup.DESCRIPTION: Remove bot invocations and messages from bots.

purge.DESCRIPTION: Remove messages which meet a criteria.

mass.ALREADY_HAS: Everyone you can manage already has {role}!

create.TOO_MANY: This server has too many roles! (`250`)

ANTINUKE.THRESHOLD: You've exceeded the antinuke threshold for **role creation**!

delete.CONFIRM: {role} has {count:member}, are you sure you want to delete it?

ANTINUKE.THRESHOLD: You've exceeded the antinuke threshold for **role deletion**!

errors.MISSING_PERMISSIONS: I don't have permission to delete messages!
errors.NO_MESSAGES: No messages were found, try a larger search?

all.DESCRIPTION: Prevent members from sending messages in all channels.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Are you sure you want to lock **ALL** channels?
CONFIRM.WARNING: You haven't ignored any important channels yet

role.DESCRIPTION: Set the role which will be locked from sending messages.

ignore.DESCRIPTION: Ignore a channel from being unintentionally locked.

remove.DESCRIPTION: Remove a channel from being ignored.

unlockdown.CHANNEL_TYPE: You can only unlock text channels!

all.DESCRIPTION: Allow members to send messages in all channels.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Are you sure you want to unlock **ALL** channels?
CONFIRM.WARNING: You haven't ignored any important channels yet

disable.TEXT_ONLY: You can only set the slowmode for text channels!

nsfw.DESCRIPTION: Mark a channel as NSFW or SFW.
nsfw.TEXT_ONLY: You can only mark text channels as NSFW!

topic.TEXT_ONLY: You can only set the topic for text channels!
topic.RATELIMITED: The channel is currently ratelimited, try again in **{retry_after}**!
topic.FAILED: Failed to set the topic for {channel}!

remove.TEXT_ONLY: You can only remove the topic for text channels!
remove.RATELIMITED: The channel is currently ratelimited, try again in **{retry_after}**!
remove.FAILED: Failed to remove the topic for {channel}!

drag.DESCRIPTION: Drag member(s) to the voice channel.
drag.NO_VOICE: You aren't in a voice channel!

all.DESCRIPTION: Move all members to another voice channel.
all.NO_VOICE: You aren't in a voice channel!

drag_all.NO_VOICE: You aren't in a voice channel!

moveall.DESCRIPTION:
Move all members to another voice channel.
This is an alias for the `drag all` command.

newusers.DESCRIPTION: View a list of the newest members.
newusers.TITLE: New Members

kick.DESCRIPTION: Kick a member from the server.
kick.CONFIRM_BOOSTER: Are you sure you want to **kick** {member}?
kick.BOOSTER_WARNING: They are currently boosting the server!

ANTINUKE.THRESHOLD: You've exceeded the antinuke threshold for **kicks**!

hardban.DESCRIPTION:
Permanently ban a user from the server.

Only the server owner is able to unban them.
Re-running this command will remove the hard ban.
hardban.HISTORY_LIMIT: You can only delete messages up to **7 days**!
hardban.TRUSTED_ONLY: You must be a **trusted administrator** to use this command!

hardbanlist.TRUSTED_ONLY: You must be a **trusted administrator** to use this command!
hardbanlist.TITLE: Hard Banned Users

softban.DESCRIPTION:
Ban then unban a member from the server.

This is used to cleanup messages from the member.
softban.BOOSTER_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to **ban** {member}?
softban.BOOSTER_WARNING: They are currently boosting the server!

ANTINUKE.THRESHOLD: You've exceeded the antinuke threshold for **bans**!

unban.DESCRIPTION: Unban a user from the server.
unban.TRUSTED_ONLY: You must be a **trusted administrator** to unban hard banned users!

all.DESCRIPTION: Unban all banned users from the server.
all.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to unban {count:user}?

list.NO_MEMBERS: No members are currently timed out!
list.TITLE: Timed Out Members

all.NO_MEMBERS: No members are currently timed out!

emoji.DOWNLOAD_ERROR: There was an issue downloading that emoji!
emoji.TOO_LARGE: The enlarged emoji was too large to send!

information.DESCRIPTION: View detailed information about an emoji.
information.TITLE: {name}

sticker.NOT_IN_SERVER: That sticker is not in this server!

add.DESCRIPTION: Add a sticker to the server.
add.NO_STICKER: You need to attach a sticker!
add.STICKER_LIMIT: The server is at the **maximum** amount of stickers!
add.RATELIMITED: The server is currently ratelimited, try again in **{retry_after}**!

tag.RATELIMITED: Rate limited after updating {count} stickers. Please wait {retry_after}...
tag.FAILED:
Failed to update {failed} stickers!
Successfully updated: {success}/{total}

rename.NO_STICKER: You need to attach or reply to a sticker!
rename.NAME_TOO_SHORT: The sticker name must be at least **2 characters** long!

delete.NO_STICKER: You need to attach a sticker!

archive.DESCRIPTION: Archive all stickers into a zip file.
archive.PREMIUM_REQUIRED: The server must have at least Level 2 to use this command!

steal.DESCRIPTION: Steal a sticker from a message.
steal.NO_MESSAGE: I couldn't find a message with a sticker in the past 25 messages!
steal.NO_STICKERS: That message doesn't have any stickers!
steal.STICKER_LIMIT: The server is at the **maximum** amount of stickers!
steal.ALREADY_EXISTS: That sticker is already in this server!
steal.RATELIMITED: The server is currently ratelimited, try again in **{retry_after}**!

add.DESCRIPTION: Add an emoji to the server.
add.EMOJI_LIMIT: The server is at the **maximum** amount of emojis!
add.RATELIMITED: The server is currently ratelimited, try again in **{retry_after}**!

name.FAILED: Failed to change the server's name!

sticker.DESCRIPTION: Toggle replying with a welcome sticker.

notifications.DESCRIPTION: Change the server's default notification settings.

nuke.DESCRIPTION:
Clone the current channel.
This action is irreversable and will delete the channel.
nuke.TEXT_ONLY: You can only nuke text channels!

CONFIRM.TITLE: Are you sure you want to **nuke** this channel?
CONFIRM.DESCRIPTION: This action is **irreversable** and will delete the channel!

SUCCESS.TITLE: Channel Nuked
SUCCESS.DESCRIPTION: This channel has been nuked by {author}

pin.WRONG_GUILD: The message must be in this server!

jail.NOTIFICATION: {user}, you have been jailed! Wait for a staff member to unjail you and check direct messages if you have received one!

setme.DESCRIPTION: Enable the jail system in your server.
setme.NO_PERMISSIONS: I don't have permission to create channels!

unsetme.DESCRIPTION: Disable the jail system in your server.
unsetme.NOT_ENABLED: The jail system is **not** enabled in this server!
unsetme.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to disable jail?

fakepermissions.DESCRIPTION: Restrict moderators to only use Evict for moderation.

grant.DESCRIPTION:
Add one or more fake permissions to a role.
> Can use multiple permissions at once if seperated by a comma (,).
> https://docs.evict.bot/configuration/fakepermissions
grant.INVALID_PERMISSIONS: Invalid permissions. Run ``{prefix}fakepermissions permissions`` to view the list of valid permisions.

revoke.DESCRIPTION:
Remove one or more fake permissions from a role's fake permissions.
> Can use multiple permissions at once if seperated by a comma (,).
> https://docs.evict.bot/configuration/fakepermissions
revoke.NO_PERMISSIONS: There are no fake permissions associated with {role}!
revoke.NOT_FOUND: {role} does not have any of the specified fake permissions!

list.DESCRIPTION: View all fake permissions for the server.
list.NONE_EXIST: No fake permissions exist for this server!
list.TITLE: Fake Permissions

permissions.DESCRIPTION: Get every valid permission that can be used for fake permissions.
permissions.TITLE: Valid Fake Permissions

modhistory.DESCRIPTION: View moderation history for a moderator.
modhistory.TITLE: Mod history for {moderator}

history.DESCRIPTION: View moderation history for a user.
history.TITLE: History for {user}

add.DESCRIPTION: Add an automated action for warn thresholds.

remove.DESCRIPTION: Remove an automated action for a warn threshold.

chunkban.DESCRIPTION: Ban a certain number of newest members from the server.
chunkban.RATELIMIT: This command can only be used **once per three minutes**!
chunkban.TRUST_REQUIRED: You must be a **trusted administrator** to use this command!
chunkban.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to ban the newest {amount} members?

avatars.NO_MEMBERS: No members found with default avatars!
avatars.CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to ban members with default avatars?

immune.DESCRIPTION: Make a user or role immune to moderation actions.

add.DESCRIPTION: Add user or role to immune list.

remove.DESCRIPTION: Remove user or role from immune list.

list.DESCRIPTION: List all immune users and roles.
list.NONE: No immune users or roles found!
list.TITLE: Immune Users and Roles

picperms.DESCRIPTION: Toggle picture permissions for a user.
